name: Snowstorm of the Century: Family City Under Cold Winter Snow
name_original: Snowstorm of the Century: Family City Under Cold Winter Snow
description:
Snow have falling in the city for many days, people never saw this much snow before. The roads are blocked and people stuck at their home.

In this situation, Chantier Family and friends have decided to help the city by shovel the streets and getting rid of snow as much as possible. Try to Collect more coins to unlock 5 amazing Chantier family with different snow blower.

How to play?

- Control snow blower machine
- You must avoid hitting people and cars while removing snow from the street
- Try to collect as much as coins are possible to unlock Chantier family
--------------------
Features:

- Whole Chantier family to unlock
- Powerful snow blower with each characters

Reach The Craques Potes Family at: family@craquespotes.com
